name: Angell Echo
description:
Angell Echo is a software and mobile app developer that specializes in innovation and state-of-the-art technology. Our team is dedicated to providing clients with the tools they need for success by creating amazing mobile experiences. Angell Echo apps have received recognition internationally, earning prominent features at the Learning 2.0 conference, Apple’s 2011 App Store Rewind, the 2013 Worldwide Developers Conference, and much more. 
3D PanEx is a unique Angell Echo technology that blends the virtual and real world to create a visually stunning user interface. 3D PanEx turns an app into an experience. 
Angell Echo stays on the forefront of cutting edge mobile technology. We develop augmented reality apps and large scale digital platforms for content management. 
Over the last 5 years, we’ve developed and published dozens of apps for businesses from a wide variety of industries, among others Bayer Pharmaceuticals, Hello Kitty, and Mizuno.
